mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, inquiry.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Inquiry WHERE boardNum in ( SELECT boardNum FROM Answer WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY boardNum ASC )inquiry) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Inquiry WHERE boardNum IN ( SELECT boardNum FROM Answer WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, info.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Info WHERE boardNum in ( SELECT boardNum FROM InfoReply WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY boardNum ASC )info) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Info WHERE boardNum IN ( SELECT boardNum FROM InfoReply WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY boardNum ASC )gpurchase) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, review.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Review WHERE boardNum in ( SELECT boardNum FROM ReviewReply WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY boardNum ASC )review) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Review WHERE boardNum IN ( SELECT boardNum FROM ReviewReply WHERE userID = #{userID} )
and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT orderNum, orderDate, price FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, orderList.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM orderList WHERE userID = #{userID} ORDER BY orderNum ASC )orderList) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

SELECT o.orderNum, o.orderDate, o.price, o.userID, o.bank, o.address,l.lineItemNum, l.price AS lineItem_price, l.boardNum, l.boardTitle FROM orderList o, (SELECT gt.orderNum, gt.price, gt.boardNum, gt.lineItemNum, g.boardTitle AS boardTitle FROM GLineItem gt, gpurchase g where gt.boardNum = g.boardNum ) l WHERE o.orderNum = l.orderNum and o.orderNum = #{orderNum}

SELECT o.orderNum, o.orderDate, o.price, o.userID, o.bank, o.address,l.lineItemNum, l.price AS lineItem_price, l.boardNum, l.boardTitle FROM orderList o, (SELECT st.orderNum, st.price, st.boardNum, st.lineItemNum, s.boardTitle AS boardTitle FROM SLineItem st, secondhand s where st.boardNum = s.boardNum ) l WHERE o.orderNum = l.orderNum and o.orderNum = #{orderNum}

and boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
